    • Method Detail

      • generatePodcastRSS

        String generatePodcastRSS()
        Method to generate the XML file for the feed.

      • generatePodcastRSS

        String generatePodcastRSS(String siteID,
                        String feedType)
        Method to generate the XML file for the specific category of feed with the name, siteId, and feedType passed it. So if different formats are supported, we are ready.
        Parameters:
        siteID - The siteId for the site wanted
        feedType - The feed type (Currently RSS 2.0)
        Returns:
        A string that is the XML file

      • getPodfeedTitle

        String getPodfeedTitle()
        Gets the global feed title for the podcast.
        Returns:
        String containing the global podcast feed title.

      • getPodfeedTitle

        String getPodfeedTitle(String siteId)

      • setPodfeedTitle

        void setPodfeedTitle(String feedTitle)
        Sets the global feed title to the string passed in.
        Parameters:
        feedTitle - The new title for the podcast feed.

      • getPodfeedDescription

        String getPodfeedDescription()
        Returns the global description for the podcast feed.
        Returns:
        String containing the global podcast feed description.

      • retrievePodcastFolderId

        String retrievePodcastFolderId(String siteId)
        Returns podcast folder id using either 'podcasts' or 'Podcasts'. If it does not exist in either form, will create it.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site to search
        Returns:
        String containing the complete id for the podcast folder
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • allowAccess

        boolean allowAccess(String id)
        Determines if authenticated user has 'read' access to podcast collection folder
        Parameters:
        id - The id for the podcast collection folder
        Returns:
        TRUE - has read access, FALSE - does not
